hero.title: About Gyanam Academy
hero.subtitle: Established in 2012, we have been providing quality education in Sukansuti, Assam for over a decade.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Gyanam Academy was established in 2012 with a vision to provide quality education to the rural community of Sukansuti, Assam. Starting as a small educational institution, we have grown to serve students from Class 1 to 12, becoming a beacon of learning in the Behalai block of Biswanath district.

Our journey has been marked by a commitment to academic excellence and holistic development. With a current student strength of 724, we provide a nurturing environment that fosters intellectual growth, creativity, and character development.

Located in the serene village of Sukansuti, our institution is recognized by the State Board and offers a co-educational environment that respects diversity and promotes inclusive education. Our modern facilities and dedicated faculty ensure that every student receives the attention and resources they need to succeed.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide quality education that empowers students from rural Assam to achieve their full potential, fostering academic excellence, critical thinking, and ethical values in a supportive and inclusive environment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading educational institution in Behalai block, recognized for academic excellence, innovative teaching methods, and for nurturing responsible citizens who contribute positively to society.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: Striving for the highest academic standards and personal growth

items.title: Inclusivity
items.description: Providing equal opportunities for all students in our rural community

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Implementing modern teaching methods while preserving traditional values

items.title: Integrity
items.description: Upholding honesty, ethics, and moral values in all our actions

milestones.event: Gyanam Academy established in Sukansuti, Assam
Expanded to include upper primary section (Classes 6-8)
Recognized by the State Education Department
Awarded for academic excellence in Behalai Block
Expanded digital infrastructure with new computer lab

mission: To provide quality education that transforms students into responsible, ethical leaders and lifelong learners who contribute meaningfully to society through innovation, research, and service.
vision: To be a globally recognized institution of academic excellence that fosters intellectual growth, critical thinking, and holistic development of students.
awardsAndAchievements: Recognized by the State Education Department for academic excellence
Awarded for maintaining excellent infrastructure and facilities
Consistently achieving high pass percentages in board examinations
Best Placement Record 2019 - National HRD Network
